name: The Dune Burrower

specials.name: Ankhrav Venom
specials.description: Saving Throw: DC 18 Fortitude Maximum Duration: 6 rounds Stage 1: 1d6 poison damage and enfeebled 1 (1 round) Stage 2: 1d6 poison damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round) Stage 3: 1d6 poison damage and enfeebled 3 (1 round)

specials.name: Sandcloud Eruption
specials.description: Effect: The Dune Burrower violently bursts from the ground, creating a 15-foot-radius cloud of sand and debris. Creatures within the area must succeed at a DC 18 Reflex save or be blinded for 1 round. The area becomes difficult terrain for 1 minute.

specials.name: Subterranean Ambush
specials.description: Effect: While burrowing, The Dune Burrower can move up to its burrow Speed and make a single Mandibles Strike at the end of its movement. This attack deals an additional 1d6 precision damage.

specials.name: Acidic Spray
specials.description: Effect: The Dune Burrower expels a 30-foot line of acid. Creatures in the line take 4d6 acid damage (DC 18 basic Reflex save).

specials.name: Burrow Mastery
specials.description: Effect:  The Dune Burrower can burrow through sand, dirt, and soft stone at its full burrow Speed, leaving behind a usable tunnel.

description:
These horse-sized, burrowing monsters generally avoid heavily settled areas like cities, but ankhravs' predilection for livestock and humanoid flesh ensures that the creatures do not remain in the deep wilderness for long. Desperate farmers whose fields become infested by ankhravs often have little recourse but to seek the aid of adventurers.

It is unknown how the Dune Burrorer managed to gather enough dirt to construct it's own lair and not enough researchers have survived it's wrath to study it's behavior. All that is known now is that it a threat that has claimed the lives of many would be adventurers looking to delve deeper into the levels of the Everchanging Labyrinth.

Recall Knowledge - Animal (Nature): DC 18
Unspecific Lore: DC 16
Specific Lore: DC 13

**Tactics**
*Opening Moves* The Dune Burrower uses Sandcloud Eruption to blind and hinder opponents, creating a battlefield advantage.
*Combat Strategy* It employs Subterranean Ambush to strike unexpectedly and Acidic Spray to damage multiple foes.
*Defense* Utilizes Tremorsense to detect hidden enemies and Burrow Mastery to reposition or escape when necessary.
